data.trans: Tan rã, hỏng hóc, đổ vỡ
data.trans_hint: Hôn nhân của chúng tôi cuối cùng cũng đổ vỡ.
data.content_game_1: Our marriage finally fell apart.
data.answer_en_hint: Our marriage finally fell apart.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta bịa ra lý do để đến muộn, nhưng nó có vẻ sai sai.
data.en_hint: He made up an excuse for being late, but it didn't add up.
data.content_game_1: He made up an excuse for being late, but it didn't add up.
data.answer_en_hint: He made up an excuse for being late, but it didn't add up.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta nên nghĩ về một kế hoạch dự phòng trong trường hợp kế hoạch kinh doanh này sụp đổ.
data.en_hint: We should think of a backup plan in case this business plan falls apart.
data.content_game_1: We should think of a backup plan in case this business plan falls apart.
data.answer_en_hint: We should think of a backup plan in case this business plan falls apart.

data.trans: Sắp xếp cho cái gì xảy ra
data.trans_hint: Tôi có một cuộc họp được sắp xếp vào sáng thứ Hai tuần tới, vì vậy tôi không thể đi cùng bạn vào ngày đó được rồi.
data.en_hint: I have a meeting lined up on Monday next week, so I can't go with you on that day.
data.content_game_1: I have a meeting lined up on Monday next week, so I can't go with you on that day.
data.answer_en_hint: I have a meeting lined up on Monday next week, so I can't go with you on that day.

data.trans_hint: Trước khi bạn rời đi, hãy xếp những cái ghế thành hàng dựa vào tường.
data.en_hint: Before you leave, please line up the chairs against the wall.
data.content_game_1: Before you leave, please line up the chairs against the wall.
data.answer_en_hint: Before you leave, please line up the chairs against the wall.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy nở một nụ cười và nói với chúng tôi rằng cô ấy ổn, nhưng tôi biết cô ấy chỉ đang che giấu vấn đề.
data.en_hint: She put up a smile and told us that she was fine, but I know she was just papering over the cracks.
data.content_game_1: She put up a smile and told us that she was fine, but I know she was just papering over the cracks.
data.answer_en_hint: She put up a smile and told us that she was fine, but I know she was just papering over the cracks.

data.trans: Khó thể quên được thứ gì đó
data.trans_hint: Đã vài năm trôi qua, nhưng những gì anh ấy nói với tôi ngày hôm ấy vẫn in sâu trong tâm trí tôi.
data.en_hint: It has been a few years but what he said to me that day still sticks in my mind.
data.content_game_1: It has been a few years but what he said to me that day still sticks in my mind.
data.answer_en_hint: It has been a few years but what he said to me that day still sticks in my mind.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta đưa tay ra khỏi cửa sổ ô tô và vẫy chào chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: He stuck his hand out of the car window and waved at us.
data.content_game_1: He stuck his hand out of the car window and waved at us.
data.answer_en_hint: He stuck his hand out of the car window and waved at us.

data.trans: Vô cùng nổi bật, đáng chú ý
data.trans_hint: Kỹ năng kể chuyện của anh ấy thực sự nổi bật.
data.en_hint: His storytelling skills really stick out a mile.
data.content_game_1: His storytelling skills really stick out a mile.
data.answer_en_hint: His storytelling skills really stick out a mile.

data.trans_hint: Nếu con không dọn dẹp đồ chơi của con đi thì mẹ sẽ vứt chúng đi đó.
data.en_hint: If you don't tidy up your toys, I will throw them away.
data.content_game_1: If you don't tidy up your toys, I will throw them away.
data.answer_en_hint: If you don't tidy up your toys, I will throw them away.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta đã có một cơ hội để bù đắp cho cô ấy, nhưng anh ta lại tuột mất nó.
data.en_hint: He got a chance to make it up for her, but he just threw it away.
data.content_game_1: He got a chance to make it up for her, but he just threw it away.
data.answer_en_hint: He got a chance to make it up for her, but he just threw it away.
